name: 陳香君
objective:
駭客是一門非常廣泛的學科，涵蓋了廣泛的主題。 本課程將提供駭客攻防的各種概念，並解釋如何在即時環境中使用它們。
本課程將包括駭客的類型，駭客的優勢 / 劣勢，駭客的目的，駭客的工具，駭客的技能，駭客的流程等。
Hacking is a very broad discipline, which covers a wide range of topics. This course will provide the various concepts of Ethical Hacking and explain how you can use them in a real-time environment.
This course will include the type of hacking, advantage /disadvantage of hacking, the purpose of hacking, tools of hacking, skill of hacking, process of hacking, etc.
schedule:
Week topics
1.	Overview
2.	Ethics issues & case study
3.	Ethics frameworks & Case study
4.	Ethics best practices
5.	Type of hacking 
6.	Type of hackers 
7.	Phases of Ethical Hacking
8.	Hacking tools
9.	Penetration testing
10.	 Midterm exam
11.	-14 hacking Methodology 
15. legal aspects of ethical hacking
16-17 the practical side of ethical hacking
18. Final exam
materials:
Reference: 
An Introduction to Cybersecurity Ethics MODULE AUTHOR: Shannon Vallor, Ph.D. William J. Rewak, S.J. Professor of Philosophy, Santa Clara University
